Uses of Package
uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1

  • Classes in uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1 used by uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1
    Class
    Description
    Book
    A class that models a book and it's details: Author Title Genre ISBN Number ID Number This class utilises the ISBNValidator class of the org.apache.commons.validator.routines package
    Displayable
    An interface that represents an object that can display its details.
    IDNumber
    An interface that represents an object that has an ID Number that can be accessed or mutated.
    Loan
    A class that models a loan, including the member borrowing the book, the book, and an issue and expiration date.
    Member
    A class that models a member's details: First name Last name Email address Phone number ID Number This class utilises:
    The EmailValidator class of the org.apache.commons.validator.routines lib The PhoneNumberUtil and PhoneNumber classes of the com.google.i18n.phonenumbers lib The class also implements the Displayable and IDNumber interfaces
